const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData(prev=>({...prev,[name]:value}));};// Handle form submission (basic validation only, no actual sending)

if(!formData.name.trim()||!formData.email.trim()||!formData.message.trim()){setSubmitStatus('Please fill in all fields.');setIsSubmitting(false);return;}if(!isValidEmail(formData.email)){setSubmitStatus('Please enter a valid email address.');setIsSubmitting(false);return;}// Simulate form submission
